A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie blew almost every opportunity it had to be a great film. Shit writing\, and the only reason anyone will give it benefit of the doubt is because Star Wars is in the title\, and because the movie tried to be edgy and different. This movie is why I won't see the next one in theaters after I've seen every movie I was alive to see the first night. Plot holes\, and misuse of known characters.
